ia_training package#

Submodules#

ia_training.config module#

CONFIGURATION MODULE

ia_training.ihm module#

IHM Module: Prompt interface for IA_training

Warning

This part is only for development purpose, does NOT use it for production

ia_training.ihm.data_interface()#

Saving data interface npfy data

ia_training.ihm.get_score()#

Score IA interface to loop main

ia_training.ihm.main(args: Optional[str] = None)#

main function of the ihm

Args:

args (str, optional): Execution argument. Defaults to None.

ia_training.ihm.selecting_cmd()#

Asking id solution

Returns:

str: user input

ia_training.langue module#

Langue Module for future multilanguage integration

ia_training.langue.color_score(_test_score: float) → str#

Colorisation des valeurs de score dans la console

Args:

_test_score (float): score de test

Returns:

str: le score avec une couleur selon sa valeur

ia_training.numpyfy_data module#

NUMPYFY DATA MODULE : Convert csv data into numpy file (Speed up training)

ia_training.numpyfy_data.convert_panda_to_numpy() → array#

Convert Panda into Numpy table

Returns:

np.array: all data from files

ia_training.numpyfy_data.get_data() → tuple#

Return data from NPZ File

Returns:

tuple: data entre, classe from npz file into numpy table

ia_training.numpyfy_data.get_test_assets() → <module 'pandas' from 'C:\\Users\\trawn\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python310\\lib\\site-packages\\pandas\\__init__.py'>#

Get all CSV data file tests_assets File come from Kabble

Returns:

pd: Panda Object: Concatenate frames

ia_training.numpyfy_data.save_np_data()#

Save into NPZ file data to speed up future loading

ia_training.train module#

TRAIN MODULE: IA Training module

ia_training.train.creating_sets(_train_size: Optional[int] = None) → tuple#

Créer un set de données selon la train_size

Args:

_train_size (int | None): taille des jeu de données d’entrainement

Returns:

tuple: 4 list _e_train, _e_test, _classe_train, _classe_test

ia_training.train.mlp_learning(_e_train: list, _classe_train: list) → MLPClassifier#

Fonction d’apprentissage

Args:

_e_train (list): donnée d’entré d’entrainement _classe_train (list): donnée de sortie d’entrainement

Returns:

MLPClassifier: objet IA

ia_training.train.train_with_sets()#

Training IA model printing score
